SYNOPSIS
========

    Account logged in

DESCRIPTION
===========

    Your account logged in, here are information:

        Account             : $acc_name
        Remote              : $remote_addr
        Date                : $datetime_now

WARNING
=======

    If you didn't perform this action, report to us. May be your account are
    under attacking.

AUTHOR
======

    $root_name <root_email>
    $app_name
